about_the_game:
Support the developers of Quickie: Fantasy Adventure and enjoy a curated Supporter Pack from our artist!

What's in the pack?

The Supporter Pack includes 9 custom, high-resolution wallpapers for your desktop and mobile, along with 8 high-resolution images of your favorite Quickie: Fantasy Adventure scenes!

All 17 wallpapers are available in JPEG and PNG formats in the following sizes:

  • Ultrawide - 3440 x 1440
  • UHD 8K - 7680 x 4320
  • UHD 4K - 3840 x 2160
  • QHD - 2560 x 1440
  • FHD - 1920 x 1080
  • HD - 1280 x 720
  • Mobile - 1440 x 2880

Accessing the Supporter Pack

After purchasing and downloading the Supporter Pack, right-click on Quickie: Fantasy Adventure in your library and find the "Browse Local Files" option. This will direct you to a folder named "Quickie Fantasy Adventure - Supporter Pack" containing all of your high-quality wallpapers!

content_descriptors.notes:
This game has strong adult themes and contains frequent and explicit sexual interactions between consenting adults including - animations, images and text descriptions.

Other themes and content in the game include:

> Nudity.
> Strong language.
> References to use of alcohol.
